participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Sarah is a diligent and caring individual who values both her family and her studies.
participant_1.background: I find that music helps me relax and focus on my studies. I am married with one child. I put on my red shoes and head out to the field to practice. My dad works for UPS. I'm terrible at math.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Tom is a hands-on person who loves creating and enjoys the simple pleasures of life.
participant_2.background: I prefer to work with my hands and build things. I just got back from visiting my cousins and pets in the country. I enjoy spending hours in the local coffee shop people watching. I'm going to make my grandson a chocolate cake and brew a batch of beer. I run and play frisbee with my dog.

content.text: Hello! What have you been up to lately?
I just got back from visiting my cousins and pets in the country.
That sounds fun! I love visiting the country.
I know right? It's so peaceful and quiet. I could really use some peace and quiet right now.
Me too! I'm so busy with work and school. I need a break.
I hear you! I need a break too. Maybe we should go on vacation together sometime.
That would be awesome! I love taking vacations.
Me too! We could go to the beach or the mountains.
I'd love to go to the beach. I haven't been to the beach in years.
Me neither! It would be so much fun to swim and play in the sand.
I know right? It would be so relaxing.
Yes! We should start planning it right away.
